scenario_text.value: Okay, guys, let’s get the lead out here.
Hey, Takuma, got a sec?
Hmm? Sure, what’s up?
Ladies and gentlemen! Lend me your ears!
My, so formal...
What is it, Saki?

This could be the last time we see this
place, don’t you think?

That’s why we should take pictures in spots
that are memorable for us... Whaddaya think?
Yes, I think it’s a wonderful idea!
Photos, huh... Not a bad idea.

We’re just about to go into battle...
Is this really the time for goofing around?

It’s fine, already! If we’re high-strung all
the time we won’t hold out, you know?
Yeah, Kaito!

We’ve had our share of harsh times in this
world, but I wanna leave behind some photos.
Well... If you say so, Miu...

All right, then! You’re cool with this too,
right, Takuma?
Yeah, sounds good to me.

Well then, we’ll head to our memorable spots,
and you meet us there, okay?

Afterwards, you can give the photo data to
all of us.
Take some great shots, man!

Photos are the thing that make that click-
whir sound, right?
You want to take some too, Agumon?

Yeah, I wanna!
Let’s take a picture too, Takuma!
I hope you get some good ones!
It’s all you, Takuma!
